ingredients.ingredient: 1 pound large fresh jalapeno peppers, halved lengthwise and seeded

cookingTips: Wear gloves when handling jalapeños and avoid touching your face to prevent irritation
Brown sausage completely and let it cool before mixing with cream cheese for easier handling
Fill peppers generously but don't overstuff, as filling will expand during baking
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the cook safely handle jalapeños, properly brown sausage, and determine the ideal baking time for crispy peppers.
